Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Abanalwazi lwayo (loo nto) bengenalwazi lwayo nooyise babo. Imbi kakhulu intetho ephuma emilonyeni yabo. Abathethi nto yimbi ngaphandle kobuxoki
Kunokwenzeka wena (Muhammad) ukuba uzixhamle ngokukhathazeka umphefumlo wakho ngenxa yabo ngokungakholwa kwabo kulo myalezo (i’Kur’ân), udandatheke umphefumlo
Inene Senze okusehlabathini ukuba kube sisihombiso sawo khon’ukuze Sibavavanye (Sibone) ukuba ngubani na kubo ongoyena ulungileyo ngezenzo
Yaye inene, Siya kwenza oko kuphezu kwalo kube ngumhlaba oludlolo (ongahlumi nto)
Ucinga ukuba abantu baseMqolombeni noMbhalo (weendaba okanye amagama abantu baseMqolombeni) yayingumnqa kwimiqondiso yeThu
Xa amadodana aya kuzifihla eMqolombeni athi: “Nkosi yethu Senzele inceba evela kuWe, Usilungiselele imeko yethu ngendlela elungileyo.”
Ngoko ke Sabathi wambu (ngesigqubuthelo sobuthongo) ezindlebeni zabo eMqolombeni apho iminyaka eliqela
Saza Sabavusa khon’ukuze Sibonise okokuba liliphi na kula maqela mabini eliza kubala ngokuchanekileyo ixesha abalihlalileyo apho (eMqolombeni)
SiThi ababalisela wena (Muhammad) ibali labo ngenyaniso. Inene, bona yayingamadodana ayekholelwa eNkosini yawo yaye Sabongezelela isiKhokelo

Ke kaloku Sabomeleza iintliziyo zabo zomelela. Ekuvukeni kwabo bathi: “INkosi yethu (uAllâh) yiNkosi yamazulu nomhlaba. Asisokuze sicele komnye uthixo ngaphandle kwaKhe. (Xa sinokwenza loo nto) siya kuba ngoko sithethe ilizwi elibi kakhulu lokungakholwa

“Aba bantu bakuthi bazithabathele Thixo bambi ngaphandle kwaKhe (uAllâh) Kutheni kaloku bengabaziseli igunya elicacileyo nje! Ngubani owenza ubugwenxa ukugqitha kulowo uqamba ubuxoki ngokuchasene noAllâh
